Veratis' scanners alert him to the incoming pod. "Ah, another bot for me to
save from the wages of war." It was still to early to tell if it was a
Maximal or Predacon chip inside but the old scientist never worried about
those sorts of things. "I guess I'll have to take a short trip to greet our
new guest." The old bot set the scanners on automatic record and set off to
the north accompanied by three of his drones, one of which carried medical
suplies that might be needed if the bot was injured.
----- Original Message -----
From: Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, November 13, 2001 8:04 AM
Subject: Veratis's Problem


> OOC: If this proceeds in the way I want it to and
> Nemasis keeps his yap shut it should live up to the
> title.
>
> BIC: A stasis pod heads for Earth 10 miles north of
> the Mutant's base (uh where is that anyway?).
